767253 THE ECONOMIC OFFENCES (INAPPLICABILITY OF LIMITATION) ACT, 1974
ACT NO. 12 OF 1974 [ 27th March, 1974.]
An Act to provide for the inapplicability of the provisions of Chapter XXXVI of the Code of Criminal Procedure, 1973 to certain economic offences.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Twenty- fifth Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
1805978 1 Short title, extent and commencement.
1602180 1This Act may be called the Economic Offences (Inapplicability of Limitation) Act, 1974.
1156250 2It extends to the territories to which the Code of Criminal Procedure, 1973 (2 of 1974), applies.
497178 3It shall come into force on the 1st day of April, 1974.
306735 2 Chapter XXXVI of the Code of Criminal Procedure, 1973 not to apply to certain offences. Nothing in Chapter XXXVI of the Code of Criminal Procedure, 1973 (2 of 1974) shall apply to-
1030264 iany offence punishable under any of the enactments 3 or provisions, if any, thereof specified in the Schedule; or
844258 iiany other offence, which under the provisions of that Code, may be tried along with such offence, and every offence referred to in clause (i) or clause (ii) may be taken cognizance of by the Court having jurisdiction as if the provisions of that Chapter were not enacted.
